page.title: 05A TYPICAL WORKING DAY.
page.content: A Day in the Life of a Part-time Infant Teacher,1985. 06.30.Awakened by youngest daughter.Prepare children for school.Leave home at 08.10.Drive to school.Prepare classroom.09.00 Children have all arrived.Assembly with other children. First session number activities and listening to individual children read.Playground supervision.Infant group watch a schools television broadcast.followed by language activities.All break for dinner in classroom.After break outside take infants and some lower juniors outside to collect information about flowers and plants.Follw-up work in class. Break with children on climbing frames.Story time wityh infants. Clear away after children leave at 15.30.Drive home.Do domestic jobs and make tea.Children's bedtime.
